Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.meshes.Point
  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a single point on the scene that is not a part of an edge.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

      • shiftIndexes

        public void shiftIndexes​(int shift,
                         IndexesLoop.IndexPredicate predicate)
        The method shifts the index by a given value.
        Parameters:
        shift - the value to shift the index
        predicate - the predicate that verifies which indexes should be shifted; if null then all will be shifted

      • loadAll

        public static java.util.List<Point> loadAll​(Structure meshStructure)
                                     throws BlenderFileException
        Loads all points of the mesh that do not belong to any edge.
        Parameters:
        meshStructure - the mesh structure
        Returns:
        a list of points
        Throws:
        BlenderFileException - an exception is thrown when problems with file reading occur
